name: part_008
file: tmp_【#戌神ころね生誕祭2021】久しぶりの３Ｄライブ！？今年もいっぱいおめでとうをありがとう！【戌神ころね⧸ホロライブ】 [2l3i7MulCgs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Inugami Korone performs the song 'Ren'ai Circulation'.
Inugami Korone performs the song 'Ren'ai Saiban'.

subtitles.original: あのあなたほど あなたの中の 私の存在はまだまだ
subtitles.english: But my presence in you is not yet as big

subtitles.original: 大きくないこともわかってるけれど
subtitles.english: as yours is in me, I know that, but...

subtitles.original: 今この同じ瞬間共有してる時間
subtitles.english: This time, this moment we're sharing right now...

subtitles.original: ちりも積もればやまとなでしこ
subtitles.english: If dust piles up, it becomes a Yamato Nadeshiko.

subtitles.original: 略してちりつもやまとなでしこ!
subtitles.english: Shortened to 'Chiri-Tsumo Yamato Nadeshiko'!

subtitles.original: クラクラリ クラクラリュ
subtitles.english: Dizzy, dizzy...

subtitles.original: あなたを見上げたら それだけで眩しすぎて
subtitles.english: Just looking up at you is far too dazzling.

subtitles.original: クラクラル クラクラリュ
subtitles.english: Dizzy, dizzy...

subtitles.original: あなたを想っている それだけでとけてしまう
subtitles.english: Just thinking about you makes me melt.

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう 運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: Thank you, God, even if it's a prank of fate.

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが しあわせなの
subtitles.english: I'm happy that we were able to meet.

subtitles.original: 恋いする 季節は 欲張りに サーキュレーション
subtitles.english: Love in this season is a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋いする 気持ちは 欲張りに サーキュレーション
subtitles.english: Feeling in love is a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋いする 瞳は 欲張りに サーキュレーション
subtitles.english: Eyes in love are a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋いする 乙女は 欲張りに サーキュレーション
subtitles.english: A maiden in love is a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: ふわふわり ふわふわる あなたが名前を呼ぶ
subtitles.english: Fluffy, fluffy... just you calling my name

subtitles.original: それだけで宙に浮く
subtitles.english: makes me float in the air.

subtitles.original: ふわふわる ふわふわり あなたが笑っている
subtitles.english: Fluffy, fluffy... just you smiling

subtitles.original: それだけで笑顔になる
subtitles.english: makes me smile, too.

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう 運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: Thank you, God, even if it's a prank of fate.

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが しあわせなの
subtitles.english: I'm happy that we were able to meet.

subtitles.original: でも そんなんじゃ だめ
subtitles.english: But that's not enough, see,

subtitles.original: もう そんなんじゃ ほら
subtitles.english: that's not enough...

subtitles.original: 心は進化するよ もっともっと
subtitles.english: My heart will evolve, more and more.

subtitles.original: そう そんなんじゃ いや
subtitles.english: Yes, I don't like it like that,

subtitles.original: ねえ そんなんじゃ まだ
subtitles.english: hey, that's not enough yet...

subtitles.original: 私のこと見ててね ずっとずっと
subtitles.english: Keep looking at me, forever and ever.

subtitles.original: 恋愛裁判 作詞・作曲：40mP
subtitles.english: Love Trial / Lyrics & Composition: 40mP

subtitles.original: Oh! No! No! No! ちょっと魔がさしたんだ
subtitles.english: Oh! No! No! No! I just had a momentary lapse.

subtitles.original: そう、僕は君だけが全てさ
subtitles.english: Yes, you're everything to me.

subtitles.original: ねえ、情状酌量をください
subtitles.english: Hey, please give me some leniency.

subtitles.original: 僕一人じゃ生きていけない
subtitles.english: I can't live all by myself.

subtitles.original: Oh! Jesus! そんな目で見ないで
subtitles.english: Oh! Jesus! Don't look at me with those eyes.

subtitles.original: もう、金輪際心入れ替えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll turn over a new leaf starting now, I swear.

subtitles.original: だから、執行猶予で
subtitles.english: So, let me off with a suspended sentence,

subtitles.original: 一度だけ見逃して
subtitles.english: and overlook it just this once.

subtitles.original: 計画的な犯行の
subtitles.english: Even my alibi for this planned crime...

subtitles.original: このアリバイ工作も
subtitles.english: I can't fool only you.

subtitles.original: 君だけは騙せない
subtitles.english: With these cheap tricks, no, no, no!

subtitles.original: 小手先の手品じゃ No! No! No!
subtitles.english: It's truly a love trial.

subtitles.original: まさに恋愛裁判
subtitles.english: How much of a crime will you charge me with?

subtitles.original: 君は僕にどれくらいの罪を問う？
subtitles.english: After the tears of the final statement,

subtitles.original: 最終弁論の涙の後に
subtitles.english: the verdict you gave me was 'Guilty'.

subtitles.original: 君から告げられた僕は「ギルティ」
subtitles.english: Guilty!

subtitles.original: Oh! No! No! No! 最悪の事態だ
subtitles.english: Oh! No! No! No! This is the worst-case scenario.

subtitles.original: そう、君にフラれるくらいなら
subtitles.english: Yes, if I'm going to be dumped by you...

subtitles.original: ねえ、いっそ君の手で僕を
subtitles.english: Hey, I'd rather have you push me

subtitles.original: 暗闇に突き落としてよ
subtitles.english: down into the darkness with your own hands.

subtitles.original: Oh! Jesus! 論より証拠だ
subtitles.english: Oh! Jesus! Proof is better than theory.

subtitles.original: もう、僕は取り繕わないよ
subtitles.english: I won't try to cover it up anymore.

subtitles.original: ずっと、君の監獄に
subtitles.english: You can even lock me up

subtitles.original: 閉じ込めてもいいから
subtitles.english: in your prison forever.

subtitles.original: 性格的な問題と
subtitles.english: Due to character issues

subtitles.original: 一度だけの過ちで
subtitles.english: and just a one-time mistake,

subtitles.original: 君はもう戻らない
subtitles.english: you won't come back anymore.

subtitles.original: 口先の弁護じゃ 許されない
subtitles.english: I won't be forgiven by these lip-service defenses.
